title: Shahid
storyline: Shahid Azmi becomes an unlikely champion of human rights, particularly for Indias Muslim minority.

artists.profile_description: Rajkummar Rao, also known as Rajkumar Yadav, is an Indian actor. He has established a career in Hindi cinema and is the recipient of several awards, including a National Film Award, three Filmfare Awards, and an Asia Pacific Screen Award. He is cited in the media as one of the most talented actors of his generation.

Kay Kay Menon is an Indian film, stage and television actor who works predominantly in Hindi cinema, and also in Gujarati, Tamil and Telugu cinema. He has also won the award for best actor for the film Shoonya from Festival of Arab and Asian cinema
